sentences.en: a more professional approach to work
sentences.cn: 更专业的工作方法

sentences.en: Always seek professional legal advice before entering into any agreement.
sentences.cn: 在签订任何协定之前一定要先征求法律专业人士的意见。

sentences.en: Chicago has 6 graduate and professional schools of high repute.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥有6所颇负盛名的研究生院和专业院校。

sentences.en: He had been a professional since March 1985.
sentences.cn: 他自1985年3月以来一直是一名职业人士。

sentences.en: He had never been knocked out in a professional fight.
sentences.cn: 在职业拳击赛中，他从未被击倒判败过。

sentences.en: He is a model professional and an example to the younger lads.
sentences.cn: 他是个模范的专业人士，是年轻人的榜样。

sentences.en: He seemed fond of her in a strictly professional way.
sentences.cn: 他似乎只是出于职业缘故而喜欢她。

sentences.en: I'd love to hear it played by a professional orchestra.
sentences.cn: 我很想听听专业管弦乐队演奏它。

sentences.en: I'm a novice at these things, Lieutenant. You're the professional.
sentences.cn: 中尉，做这些事情我是新手，你是行家。

sentences.en: I've always kept my private and professional life separate.
sentences.cn: 我总是将私生活和工作分开。

sentences.en: In addition, the respondent disclosed professional confidences to one of the patients.
sentences.cn: 另外，被告还向其中一位病人透露了行业机密。

sentences.en: Polish up your writing skills on a one-week professional course.
sentences.cn: 上为期一周的专业课，提高你的写作技能。

sentences.en: the terms that doctors and other health professionals use
sentences.cn: 医师和其他保健专业人员使用的术语

sentences.en: The whole cast executed the production with truly professional aplomb.
sentences.cn: 全体演职人员以一种真正的专业精神，从容不迫地开始了影片的制作。

sentences.en: These crimes were committed largely by professional criminals who lived by crime.
sentences.cn: 这些罪案大都是由以犯罪为生的职业罪犯制造的。

sentences.en: They run it with a truly professional but personal touch.
sentences.cn: 他们的经营既有真正的专业水准又不乏个人特色。

sentences.en: They were charged with failing to have professional indemnity cover.
sentences.cn: 他们被指控未能提供职业保险保障。

sentences.en: This business plan looks very professional.
sentences.cn: 这个商业计划看上去很有专业水平。

sentences.en: What professional qualifications does he have?
sentences.cn: 他有哪些专业资格？

sentences.en: You may need to seek professional help.
sentences.cn: 你可能需要寻求专业帮助。

sentences.en: You owe it to yourself to get some professional help.
sentences.cn: 你应该为了自己寻求专业人士的帮助。

sentences.en: 英文文例句：What professional qualifications does he have?
sentences.cn: 他有哪些专业资格？

words.tran_cn: 在表面上；公然地；专业地
职业，专业；声明，宣布，表白
专业主义；专家的地位；特性或方法

phrases.tran_cn: 工作经验；工作经历；职业经验
职业经理人；专业管理者
行业标准；专业标准；职业标准

trans.tran_cn: 专业的，职业的，非业余的
trans.tran_en: showing that someone has been well trained and is good at their work
someone who earns money by doing a job, sport, or activity that many other people do just for fun
